## IFlyout.createBlock() method

Create a copy of this block on the workspace.

**Signature:**


|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  originalBlock | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) | The block to copy from the flyout. |
